VoiceDir5.7FA05: taking a breath, telling it as it is, no judgment
Line5.7FA05: The thing about Lorath… it’s hard for him to get close to people, and even harder to let them go.
Line3.7FA05: But all I wanted was to broaden our horizons. Forge new allies with the Cathedral. Start a family of my own.
Line1.7FA05: If you asked him, he’d say I abandoned the Horadrim’s ways.
